title: Print on Celebration of 15th Amendment - changes

content.question: Which of the following best explains the change evident in the sources?

choices.label: During the Civil War, northern African Americans raised money to establish schools for formerly enslaved people.
Despite initial efforts to help formerly enslaved people to own land, sharecropping eventually became widespread.
Initially, African Americans were forced to enter into labor contracts that required them to work for little pay; however, with time the compensation improved.
During Reconstruction, formerly enslaved African Americans had political representation, but with time access to voting rights became largely unavailable.

content.answer: Despite initial efforts to help formerly enslaved people to own land, sharecropping eventually became widespread.

skill.text: 1.C: Identify and explain patterns, connections, or other relationships (causation, changes, continuities, comparison).
